name: Amber Time Pocket
description:
AmberTimePocket is the original AmberTime pocket version, and some contents are adjusted



AmberTimePocket is a game that simulates life. You can go shopping in supermarkets, eat big meals in hotels, go to work in giant companies, etc

Tired of the luxurious life in the city, we can go to the fields to grow vegetables, raise pigs, etc

You like all kinds of fragrant cars and beauties of the rich. You can invest in stocks and industries. Money in the bank is also making money. If you have more money, please call some bodyguards to protect you

The map is very big. Drive your RV to explore the wild and dig the treasure house of nature

If you like the sea, you can take your yacht to the south sea for treasure hunting and sightseeing

Those who like to fight with police and bandits can prepare guns and ammunition and open up freely. What kind of tanks and armour do they really have



Amber world, let's feel the desire together! Free RPG
